amendment.description: Amendment eliminates the visa lottery program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 109-350 to eliminate the visa lottery program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 273 - 148 (Roll no. 653).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Goodlatte.
